pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo anācāraṃ ācarati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.7: “kiṃ nu kho nāma tumhe, āvuso, maṃ vattabbaṃ maññatha?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.11: Seyyathāpi nāma mahāvāto vāyanto tiṇakaṭ­ṭha­paṇṇa­sa­ṭaṃ ekato ussāreyya, seyyathā vā pana nadī pabbateyyā saṅ­kha­se­vālapa­ṇa­kaṃ ekato ussāreyya;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.12: evameva tumhe nānānāmā nānāgottā nānājaccā nānākulā pabbajitā ekato ussāritā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.13: Kiṃ nu kho nāma tumhe, āvuso, maṃ vattabbaṃ maññatha?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.19: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.20: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ channaṃ aneka­pariyā­yena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.21: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, channa, bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.24: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.25: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.26: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.27: “Bhikkhu paneva dubbacajātiko hoti uddesa­pariyā­pan­nesu sikkhāpadesu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.28: ‘mā maṃ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā, ahampāyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.31: ‘māyasmā attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi, vacanīya­mevā­yasmā attānaṃ karotu,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.32: āyasmāpi bhikkhū vadetu sahadhammena, bhikkhūpi āyasmantaṃ vakkhanti sahadhammena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.33: Evaṃ saṃvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṃ añña­mañña­vaca­nena añña­mañña­vuṭṭhā­panenā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.34: Evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ sama­nubhā­si­tabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.35: Yāvatatiyañce sama­nubhā­si­yamāno taṃ paṭi­nissaj­jeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.2: dubbaco hoti dova­cassaka­raṇehi dhammehi samannāgato akkhamo appa­dak­khi­ṇag­gāhī anusāsaniṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.11: “mā maṃ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā, ahampāyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.17: Ye passanti ye suṇanti tehi vattabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.20: Āyasmāpi bhikkhū vadetu sahadhammena, bhikkhūpi āyasmantaṃ vakkhanti sahadhammena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.21: Evaṃ saṃvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṃ añña­mañña­vaca­nena añña­mañña­vuṭṭhā­panenā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.38: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.40: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.43: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.45: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.46: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.51: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.53: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.54: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.56: Samanubhaṭṭho saṃghena itthannāmo bhikkhu tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.62: Saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhā­pajjan­tassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippas­sam­bhanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:3.1.1: Dhammakamme dhamma­kamma­saññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃ­ghā­di­sesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:3.1.2: Dhammakamme vematiko na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃ­ghā­di­sesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:3.1.3: Dhammakamme adhamma­kamma­saññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṃ­ghā­di­sesassa.
